lead_paragraph: The government authorized more overtime for screeners, faster hiring and more bomb-sniffing dogs in preparation for a busy summer travel season.

headline.print_headline: T.S.A. Offers New Measures to Ease Airport Gridlock This Summer
headline.main: T.S.A. Offers New Measures Intended to Cut Airport Gridlock This Summer

snippet: The government authorized more overtime for screeners, faster hiring and more bomb-sniffing dogs in preparation for a busy summer travel season.
abstract: Homeland Security Sec Jeh Johnson announces he has authorized measures to reduce wait times at airport checkpoints, in response to public anger; Transportation Security Administration has attributed long lines to tighter security procedures and budget cuts.
